title: Fans heap praise on Lionel Messi after Barcelona man assists Luis Suarez against Eibar
text:
Fans have lauded the genius of Lionel Messi after the Barcelona star displayed his selflessness in laying the ball onto team-mate Luis Suarez in Saturday's win over Eibar.

Suarez added Barcelona's third goal of the game when Messi found himself in acres of space and charging through on goal.

Instead of slotting the ball past the Eibar 'keeper, Messi laid the ball into the path of Suarez who tapped into an empty net.

Lionel Messi passed the ball to Luis Suarez where he could have taken a shot on goal himself

Messi's pass gave Suarez on easy finish to earn Barcelona a comfortable 3-0 victory

Wow! MESSI still gives 1 on 1 assist in 2019

Incredibly unselfish my GOAT 🐐 pic.twitter.com/oUf7f3uIaP — IU Wakili👑 🇳🇬🇳🇬 (@IU_Wakili) October 19, 2019

Supporters were quick to take to social media to heap praise on the generosity of Messi, as Barcelona moved to the top of La Liga ahead of Real Madrid's game with RCD Mallorca.

@ThJeswin said: 'Messi could have scored his second goal but he didn't. He gave it to Suarez. Cos Messi is so unselfish. #EibarBarca'

@IU_Wakili said: 'Wow! MESSI still gives 1 on 1 assist in 2019. Incredibly unselfish my GOAT'.

@tips_joker said: 'Look at Messi. The most unselfish player out there. Just giving it to Suarez so he can score as well.'

Barca's victory over Eibar was made all the sweeter for supporters of the Catalan club as they saw all three of their star forwards get on the score sheet.

New boy Antoine Griezmann opened the scoring in the first half before Messi doubled the champion's lead with a tidy finish. Suarez rounded off the victory with 25 minutes to spare.
description: Fans have lauded the genius of Lionel Messi after the Barcelona star displayed his selflessness in laying the ball onto team-mate Luis Suarez in Saturday's La Liga win over Eibar.
